name: Hot Impact
description: Red Hot's dual tank buster that hits both tanks simultaneously. Requires heavy mitigation and coordinated tank cooldowns.

name: Flame Floater
description: Red Hot launches fireballs at four players in sequence. Each hit deals moderate physical damage.

name: Alley-oop Inferno
description: Red Hot splits into multiple copies and each performs a diving attack on a player. All eight party members are targeted simultaneously with moderate raidwide damage.

name: Cutback Blaze
description: Red Hot performs a wide AoE attack that hits all party members. Deals moderate physical damage to the entire raid.

name: Pyrotation (3 hits)
description: Multi-hit raidwide. Red Hot spins while launching fire attacks, hitting all players 3 times with light physical damage.

name: Divers' Dare
description: Both bosses dive simultaneously, dealing moderate physical damage to all party members. Requires raidwide mitigation.

name: Sick Swell
description: Deep Blue creates a wave that deals light physical damage to all players. Often precedes a larger water-based attack.

name: Awesome Slab
description: Deep Blue crashes down on the party, dealing moderate physical damage to all players. The party is split between both bosses' attacks.

name: Reverse Alley-oop
description: Similar to Alley-oop, but with reversed timing. Both bosses dive at players dealing moderate physical damage to all party members.

name: Deep Impact
description: Deep Blue's single-target tank buster on the main tank. Deals heavy physical damage and requires strong tank mitigation.

name: Divers' Dare
description: Both bosses dive simultaneously, dealing moderate physical damage to all party members. Requires raidwide mitigation.

name: Xtreme Spectacular (8 hits)
description: Multi-hit raidwide. The Xtremes perform 8 rapid waves of damage on all party members. Light damage per hit but significant total damage.

name: Plunging/Blasting Snap
description: Both bosses attack with their respective elements - Deep Blue plunges while Red Hot blasts. Each player receives a spread AoE dealing moderate damage.

name: Re-entry Blast
description: Red Hot re-enters the arena with a fiery explosion, dealing moderate physical damage to multiple players.

name: Vertical Plunge
description: Deep Blue or Red Hot performs a vertical diving tank buster on the off-tank. Deals heavy physical damage and requires tank mitigation.

name: Plunging/Blasting Snap
description: Both bosses attack with their respective elements - Deep Blue plunges while Red Hot blasts. Each player receives a spread AoE dealing moderate damage.

name: Vertical Blast
description: Red Hot performs a vertical diving tank buster on the main tank. Deals heavy physical damage and requires tank mitigation.

name: Re-entry Plunge
description: Deep Blue re-enters the arena with a water-based attack, dealing moderate physical damage to multiple players.

name: Divers' Dare
description: Both bosses dive simultaneously, dealing moderate physical damage to all party members. Requires raidwide mitigation.

name: Firesnaking / Watersnaking
description: Both bosses launch their respective elemental snakes across the arena. Red Hot's fire and Deep Blue's water each hit half the party with heavy physical damage.

name: Alley-oop / Reverse Alley-oop
description: Combined attack where both bosses perform their diving mechanics. All party members receive moderate physical damage from the simultaneous assaults.

name: Hot Impact
description: Red Hot's dual tank buster that hits both tanks simultaneously. Requires heavy mitigation and coordinated tank cooldowns.

name: Awesome Splash / Inferno
description: Both bosses combine their ultimate attacks - Deep Blue's splash and Red Hot's inferno. Deals moderate physical damage to all players.

name: Hot Aerial
description: Red Hot launches aerial fire attacks on targeted players. Deals high physical damage to those hit and requires spread positioning.

name: Sick Swell
description: Deep Blue creates a wave that deals light physical damage to all players. Often precedes a larger water-based attack.

name: Awesome Splash
description: Deep Blue crashes down with a water-based attack on half the party. Deals high physical damage to those targeted.

name: Cutback Blaze
description: Red Hot performs a wide AoE attack that hits all party members. Deals moderate physical damage to the entire raid.

name: Deep Impact
description: Deep Blue's single-target tank buster on the main tank. Deals heavy physical damage and requires strong tank mitigation.

name: Divers' Dare
description: Both bosses dive simultaneously, dealing moderate physical damage to all party members. Requires raidwide mitigation.

name: Deep Aerial
description: Deep Blue launches aerial water attacks on two targeted players. Applies a water DoT that ticks for significant damage over time.

name: Xtreme Wave (Multiple)
description: A series of wave attacks during the Watery Grave phase. Multiple hits of light damage as waves crash across the arena.

name: Scathing Steam
description: The Watery Grave erupts with scalding steam, dealing moderate physical damage to all players caught in the blast zone.

name: Steam Burst
description: The Xtreme Aether releases a burst of steam. This is primarily a phase transition marker with no significant damage.

name: Divers' Dare
description: Both bosses dive simultaneously, dealing moderate physical damage to all party members. Requires raidwide mitigation.

name: Alley-oop Inferno
description: Red Hot splits into multiple copies and each performs a diving attack on a player. All eight party members are targeted simultaneously with moderate raidwide damage.

name: Alley-oop Double-dip
description: An enhanced version of Alley-oop where both bosses dive at players twice in succession. Deals higher damage than the standard version.

name: Freaky Pyrotation (2 hits)
description: Multi-hit raidwide. Deep Blue's version of Pyrotation. A spinning water attack that hits all players 2 times with moderate damage.

name: Sick Swell
description: Deep Blue creates a wave that deals light physical damage to all players. Often precedes a larger water-based attack.

name: Awesome Slab
description: Deep Blue crashes down on the party, dealing moderate physical damage to all players. The party is split between both bosses' attacks.

name: Divers' Dare
description: Both bosses dive simultaneously, dealing moderate physical damage to all party members. Requires raidwide mitigation.

name: Xtreme Firesnaking / Watersnaking
description: The enhanced version of the snake attacks. Both bosses launch larger, more damaging elemental snakes that deal heavy physical damage.

name: Plunging/Blasting Snap
description: Both bosses attack with their respective elements - Deep Blue plunges while Red Hot blasts. Each player receives a spread AoE dealing moderate damage.

name: Bailout
description: Minor damage dealt as the bosses transition or jump away. Deals light physical damage to all players.

name: Re-entry Plunge / Blast
description: Both bosses re-enter simultaneously with their respective elements. Deals moderate physical damage to all players.

name: Bailout
description: Minor damage dealt as the bosses transition or jump away. Deals light physical damage to all players.

name: Plunging/Blasting Snap
description: Both bosses attack with their respective elements - Deep Blue plunges while Red Hot blasts. Each player receives a spread AoE dealing moderate damage.

name: Bailout
description: Minor damage dealt as the bosses transition or jump away. Deals light physical damage to all players.

name: Vertical Plunge / Blast
description: Combined tank buster from both bosses. One tank receives Vertical Plunge, the other receives Vertical Blast. Heavy physical damage requiring coordinated tank mitigation.

name: Bailout
description: A heavy Bailout dealing massive damage to tanks during the Vertical Plunge/Blast sequence. This is part of the tank buster resolution.

name: Divers' Dare
description: Both bosses dive simultaneously, dealing moderate physical damage to all party members. Requires raidwide mitigation.

name: Alley-oop/ Double-dip
description: An enhanced version of Alley-oop where both bosses dive at players twice in succession. Deals higher damage than the standard version.

name: Alley-oop Inferno
description: Red Hot splits into multiple copies and each performs a diving attack on a player. All eight party members are targeted simultaneously with moderate raidwide damage.

name: Pyrotation (3 hits) + Deep Impact
description: Combined attack: Red Hot performs 3-hit Pyrotation while Deep Blue executes Deep Impact on both tanks. This is a dual tank buster with multi-hit raidwide damage happening simultaneously.

name: Pyrotation (3 hits)
description: Multi-hit raidwide. Red Hot spins while launching fire attacks, hitting all players 3 times with light physical damage.

name: Pyrotation (3 hits)
description: Multi-hit raidwide. Red Hot spins while launching fire attacks, hitting all players 3 times with light physical damage.

name: Divers' Dare
description: Both bosses dive simultaneously, dealing moderate physical damage to all party members. Requires raidwide mitigation.

name: Divers' Dare
description: The final Divers' Dare before enrage. Both bosses dive with increased intensity dealing high physical damage. Requires full raidwide mitigation.
